name: aventux/cover-bulk-edit
description: AventCoverBulkEdit adds the ability to set cover images of products in bulk to Shopware 6. Perfect for quick and efficient updates of main images in large product catalogs.

description.de-DE: AventCoverBulkEdit fügt Shopware 6 die Möglichkeit hinzu, Coverbilder von Produkten in großen Mengen festzulegen. Ideal für schnelle und effiziente Anpassungen der Hauptbilder in umfangreichen Produktkatalogen.
description.en-GB: AventCoverBulkEdit adds the ability to set cover images of products in bulk to Shopware 6. Perfect for quick and efficient updates of main images in large product catalogs.
